section.title: Allergies and Intolerances
section.text:
this section is representative of the current allergy information, at the time of the michael generation. in the case of regeneration of the michael, the allergy information may not reflect the state of known allergies at the time of the michael's subject visit.
Seroquel causes unspecified. Status:Active.
Latex causes Rash. Status:Active.
Penicillins causes Unknown unspecified. Status:Active.
Tape (as Miscellaneous allergen) causes unspecified. Status:Active.
No IV Contrast Allergy.
No Known Food Allergies.

item.content: INFLUENZA FLULAVAL (6MO-ADULT) (FLULAVAL (6MO-ADULT) SYRG, GLAXOSMITHKLINE, Lot # 972f3); Administered 2019-08-10 3:46 PM; 0.5 ML = 0.5 ML, Intramuscular

text.paragraph: It is the responsibility of the patient or patient representative to confirm the list of medications with either the patient's personal care provider or the patient's follow-up care provider to ensure the patient has an appropriate list of medications to take at home.

item.content:
cefdinir 300 mg Capsule, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 capsule oral every twelve hours

prednsione
Directions: 40 mg on day 1 then taper down by 5 mg daily down to zero mg
Additional Instructions: 40mg po on day 1 then taper down by 5 mg po daily down to zero mg

albuterol sulfate (ProAir HFA) 90 mcg HFA Aerosol Inhaler, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 2 puff by inhalation four times daily PRN shortness of breath

aripiprazole 20 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral daily

budesonide-formoterol (Symbicort) 160 mcg-4.5 mcg/Actuation HFA Aerosol Inhaler, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 2 puff by inhalation twice a day

busPIRone 30 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral twice a day

cholecalciferol (vitamin D3) 50,000 unit Capsule, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 capsule oral every Monday

codeine-guaifenesin (Cheratussin AC) 10 mg-100 mg/5 mL Liquid, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 10 mL oral every four hours PRN cough

cyclobenzaprine 10 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral three times a day PRN pain

EPINEPHrine (EpiPen) 0.3 mg/0.3 mL Auto-Injector, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 syringe intramuscular once PRN shortness of breath

gabapentin 800 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral four times daily

ipratropium-albuterol 0.5 mg-3 mg (2.5 mg base)/3 mL Solution for Nebulization, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 3 mL by inhalation every six hours with respiratory treatments

lamoTRIgine 150 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral twice a day

lidocaine 5 % Ointment, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 application topical three times a day PRN pain

lisinopril 5 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral daily

montelukast 10 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral daily

morphine-naltrexone (Embeda) 30 mg-1.2 mg capsule,oral only,ext.rel pell, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 capsule oral twice a day

oxyCODONE 30 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral three times a day

propranolol 20 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral twice a day

rizatriptan 10 mg tablet,disintegrating, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral daily PRN headache

tiotropium bromide (Spiriva Respimat) 2.5 mcg/actuation Mist, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 2 spray by inhalation daily

tiZANidine 4 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral three times a day PRN pain

traZODone 150 mg Tablet, Ordered By: Ali A Minhas, MD
Directions: 1 tablet oral daily at bedtime

vilazodone (Viibryd) 40 mg Tablet
Directions: 1 tablet oral daily

clotrimazole 1 % Cream
Directions: 1 application topical four times daily PRN itching

tobramycin (ToBREx) 0.3 % Drops
Directions: 2 drop ophthalmic, left eye every 4 hours for 5 days

tobramycin 0.3% Solution for Nebulization
Directions: by inhalation twice a day

etodolac 200 mg Capsule
Directions: 1 capsule oral three times a day

pravastatin 40 mg Tablet
Directions: 1 tablet oral daily at bedtime

list.item: Discharge Disposition : Home or Self Care
Weight Statement : Weigh yourself daily and report weight gain of 2-3 pounds in a 24-hour period or 5 pounds in one week to your physician.
Signs and Symptoms Statement : If signs / symptoms worsen as defined in the discharge instructions, call your doctor or go to the Emergency Department.
Treatment and Continuing Care : Return to ER or call your doctor for chest pain, shortness of breath
Post Discharge Goal : Patient will attend post discharge physician appointments

Follow Up Appt Statement : If follow-up appointment not arranged prior to your hospital discharge, please call your physician in 1 - 2 days after your discharge to schedule your follow-up appointment.
Follow Up Appt Provider 1 : M.B. Byrd-PCP (Kim)
Reviewed Discharge Medication Instructions with Patient/Designee : Yes
E-Prescribed to Retail/Mail Order Pharmacy : Not Applicable

Discharge Instructions/Teach Back : Reviewed Discharge Instructions with Patient/Designee,Patient/Designee Verbalized Understanding of Discharge Instructions,Patient/Designee Received Written Instructions
Discharge Instructions Acknowledgement Statement : I hereby state that I have received the above discharge instructions and understand such instructions after having them explained to me.
